did.unittitle: Sarah Mandell Oral History and Related Documents,
did.repository: Kheel Center for Labor-Management Documentation and Archives, Cornell University Library
did.abstract: Documents and oral history pertaining to Sarah Mandell, rank and file member of Local 155 of the ILGWU.

bioghist.p: Sarah Goldberg Mandell (August 15, 1891-May 5, 1998). According to information found on the Ellis Island website, Sarah Goldberg arrived in the United States on June 16, 1909 at the age of 17 from London, England, her ethnicity was listed as Russia Hebrew.
Sarah was a member of the Knitgoods Workers' Union Local 155, UNITE, she retired in 1957. She passed away in May of 1998 at the age of 104.

accessrestrict.p: Access to the collections in the Kheel Center is restricted. Please contact a reference archivist for access to these materials.

userestrict.p: This collection must be used in keeping with the Kheel Center Information Sheet and Procedures for Document Use.
